content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'odw-curated_pinsodwdatadevstorage_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [odw-curated_pinsodwdatadevstorage_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://odw-curated@pinsodwdatadevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dim_date (
	[dim_date_key] nvarchar(4000),
	[date] nvarchar(4000),
	[day_int] nvarchar(4000),
	[day_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[month_int] nvarchar(4000),
	[first_of_month] nvarchar(4000),
	[month_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[week_int] nvarchar(4000),
	[iso_week_int] nvarchar(4000),
	[day_of_week_int] nvarchar(4000),
	[quarter_int] nvarchar(4000),
	[quarter_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[year_int] nvarchar(4000),
	[first_of_year] nvarchar(4000),
	[week_ending_date] nvarchar(4000),
	[financial_year] nvarchar(4000),
	[FY_yyyy] nvarchar(4000),
	[week_ending_year] nvarchar(4000),
	[week_ending_quarter_int] nvarchar(4000),
	[week_ending_quarter_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[week_ending_month_int] nvarchar(4000),
	[week_ending_month_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[week_ending_day] nvarchar(4000),
	[MonthYearSortKey] nvarchar(4000),
	[MonthYear] nvarchar(4000),
	[FY] nvarchar(4000),
	[FY_Latest] nvarchar(4000),
	[FY_MonthYearLatest] nvarchar(4000),
	[FY_Quarter] nvarchar(4000),
	[FY_Latest_SortKey] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'date/dim_date.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [odw-curated_pinsodwdatadevstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.dim_date
GO
